changeSet.author: Catalin Enache
changeSet.comment: drop previously created tables for migration - MIGR_* and TB_D tables

changeSet.author: Sebastian-Ion TINCU
changeSet.sql:

ALTER TABLE TB_PM_PAYLOAD RENAME CONSTRAINT PK_PM_PAYLOAD TO OLD_PK_PM_PAYLOAD / ALTER INDEX PK_PM_PAYLOAD RENAME TO OLD_PK_PM_PAYLOAD /

ALTER TABLE TB_PM_ROLE RENAME CONSTRAINT PK_PM_ROLE TO OLD_PK_PM_ROLE / ALTER INDEX PK_PM_ROLE RENAME TO OLD_PK_PM_ROLE /

changeSet.author: Catalin Enache
changeSet.sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UIDX_D_MSG_PROP_NAME_VALUE_TYPE ON TB_D_MESSAGE_PROPERTY (NAME(100), VALUE(100), (CASE WHEN TYPE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TYPE END));
ALTER TABLE TB_D_MESSAGE_PROPERTY ADD CONSTRAINT UK_D_MSG_PROP_NAME UNIQUE (NAME, VALUE, TYPE);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UIDX_D_PART_PROP_NAME_VALUE_TYPE ON TB_D_PART_PROPERTY (NAME(100), VALUE(100), (CASE WHEN TYPE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TYPE END));
ALTER TABLE TB_D_PART_PROPERTY ADD CONSTRAINT UK_D_PART_PROP_NAME UNIQUE (NAME, VALUE, TYPE);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UIDX_D_SERVICE_VALUE_TYPE ON TB_D_SERVICE (VALUE, (CASE WHEN TYPE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TYPE END));
ALTER TABLE TB_D_SERVICE ADD CONSTRAINT UK_D_SERVICE_VALUE_TYPE UNIQUE (VALUE, TYPE);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UIDX_D_PARTY_VALUE_TYPE ON TB_D_PARTY (VALUE, (CASE WHEN TYPE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TYPE END));
ALTER TABLE TB_D_PARTY ADD CONSTRAINT UK_D_PARTY_VALUE_TYPE UNIQUE (VALUE, TYPE);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UIDX_D_AGREEMENT_VALUE_TYPE ON TB_D_AGREEMENT (VALUE, (CASE WHEN TYPE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TYPE END));
ALTER TABLE TB_D_AGREEMENT ADD CONSTRAINT UK_D_AGREEMENT_VALUE_TYPE UNIQUE (VALUE, TYPE);

column.name: SOURCE_MESSAGE
column.remarks: true if the message is a SourceMessage

column.name: MESSAGE_FRAGMENT
column.remarks: true if the message is a message fragment

column.name: EBMS3_TIMESTAMP
column.remarks: the EBMS3 timestamp present in eb:Messaging/eb:UserMessage/eb:MessageInfo/eb:Timestamp

createTable.remarks: Stores information about the message group for SplitAndJoin

column.name: MESSAGE_SIZE
column.remarks: The message size before compression

column.name: COMPRESSED_MESSAGE_SIZE
column.remarks: The size of the message after compression

column.name: REJECTED
column.remarks: True if the message group has been rejected

column.name: EXPIRED
column.remarks: True if the message group has expired

createTable.remarks: Stores the message header details for SplitAndJoin

column.name: BOUNDARY
column.remarks: The multipart boundary value

column.name: START_MULTIPART
column.remarks: The multipart start value

column.name: EBMS3_TIMESTAMP
column.remarks: the EBMS3 timestamp present in eb:Messaging/eb:UserMessage/eb:MessageInfo/eb:Timestamp

column.name: SCHEDULED
column.remarks: true if the message is already scheduled to be sent

column.name: VERSION
column.remarks: Used for optimistic locking mechanism

column.name: ALERT_IMM_NOTIFICATION_DATE
column.remarks: Alert imminent notification date

column.name: ALERT_EXP_NOTIFICATION_DATE
column.remarks: Alert expired notification date

column.name: ALERT_IMM_NOTIFICATION_DATE
column.remarks: Alert imminent notification date

column.name: ALERT_EXP_NOTIFICATION_DATE
column.remarks: Alert expired notification date

column.name: KEY_USAGE
column.remarks: The encryption usage: PAYLOAD

column.name: SECRET_KEY
column.remarks: The secret key used for symmetric encryption

column.name: INIT_VECTOR
column.remarks: The initialization vector used for encryption

column.name: RETENTION_SENT
column.remarks: Retention time for sent messages (both send success and send failure)

column.name: DELETE_MESSAGE_METADATA
column.remarks: Specifies whether the message metadata should be deleted or not.

column.name: MAX_BATCH_DELETE
column.remarks: Maximum number of DOWNLOADED/UNDOWNLOADED/SENT messages to be deleted in one batch

createTable.remarks: Stores the configuration of the SplitAndJoin parameters configured in the PMode

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: Splitting configuration name

column.name: FRAGMENT_SIZE
column.remarks: The fragment size

column.name: COMPRESSION
column.remarks: True if compression will be used

column.name: COMPRESSION_ALGORITHM
column.remarks: Compression algorithm to use for compressing the SourceMessage

column.name: JOIN_INTERVAL
column.remarks: The join interval

column.name: FK_BUSINESSPROCESS
column.remarks: Foreign key to the business process
